title: Assad’s allies show support for Syrian regime; U.S. conflicted by surge, Sullivan says
Live briefing: Syrian rebels advance after wresting control of most of Aleppo
content: The offensive, led by rebel group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, shifts the front lines of Syria’s civil war. Government forces appeared to withdraw from some areas.
summary: The offensive, led by rebel group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, shifts the front lines of Syria’s civil war. Government forces appeared to withdraw from some areas.

title: Rebels are roaming the streets of Aleppo, residents say
In Syria, a sudden reminder of a war that never ended
content: The dramatic unraveling of the past days might show how hollow Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s supremacy was.
summary: The dramatic unraveling of the past days might show how hollow Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s supremacy was.

title: What led to Syria’s 13-year civil war, and why has fighting surged again?
content: The sudden assault by Syrian rebels has rapidly redrawn the civil war’s front lines and threatened once again the authority of President Bashar al-Assad.
summary: The sudden assault by Syrian rebels has rapidly redrawn the civil war’s front lines and threatened once again the authority of President Bashar al-Assad.

title: Divided over whether to stop making plastic, U.N. treaty talks collapse
content: Delegates from more than 170 countries huddled for a week of marathon negotiations but came up short on delivering a treaty.
summary: Delegates from more than 170 countries huddled for a week of marathon negotiations but came up short on delivering a treaty.

title: Iranian envoy meets with Assad to reassure ‘friends in hard times’
Syrian rebels regrouped, seized on weakness of government’s key allies
content: The rebels have made stunning gains against President Bashar al-Assad’s forces, with Russia, Iran and Hezbollah distracted by other conflicts.
summary: The rebels have made stunning gains against President Bashar al-Assad’s forces, with Russia, Iran and Hezbollah distracted by other conflicts.

title: Trump win emboldens Israeli settlers seeking control of the West Bank
content: Israel’s extremist settlers see few barriers to their plans to rule the West Bank now that Trump is returning to the White House.
summary: Israel’s extremist settlers see few barriers to their plans to rule the West Bank now that Trump is returning to the White House.

title: Syria rebels regrouped, seized on weakness of government’s key allies
Inside the effort to market Russia and Putin to Africans
content: The Africa Initiative is part of an opaque network of groups that Western officials and analysts say the Kremlin uses to spread Russian influence in Africa.

title: Syrian rebels defend gains in Aleppo, push south
In silence and bluster, a shadow Trump foreign policy haunts Biden’s final acts
content: While Biden attempts to lock in policy priorities with partners, Mar-a-Lago is becoming a magnet for foreign leaders eager to win Trump’s good graces.
summary: While Biden attempts to lock in policy priorities with partners, Mar-a-Lago is becoming a magnet for foreign leaders eager to win Trump’s good graces.

title: Syrian rebels defend gains in Aleppo, push south
content: The insurgent offensive, shocking for its speed, has posed the most serious challenge to President Bashar al-Assad in years.
summary: The insurgent offensive, shocking for its speed, has posed the most serious challenge to President Bashar al-Assad in years.

title: Trump threatens tariffs on BRICS nations, demanding they use dollar
content: The move comes after Canada’s prime minister rushed to Mar-a-Lago to dine with the president-elect to dissuade him over another big tariff threat.
summary: The move comes after Canada’s prime minister rushed to Mar-a-Lago to dine with the president-elect to dissuade him over another big tariff threat.

title: See the scale of destruction in Hezbollah’s stronghold near Beirut
content: Dozens of buildings lie in ruins along the street known as Hadi Nasrallah, a road that cuts through the Beirut suburb of Dahiyeh, a Hezbollah stronghold.
summary: Dozens of buildings lie in ruins along the street known as Hadi Nasrallah, a road that cuts through the Beirut suburb of Dahiyeh, a Hezbollah stronghold.

title: Israeli strikes continue amid cease-fire deal with Hezbollah
content: The IDF said it conducted a strike on military infrastructure sites near the border crossings between Lebanon and Syria, calling it a response to cease-fire violations.
summary: The IDF said it conducted a strike on military infrastructure sites near the border crossings between Lebanon and Syria, calling it a response to cease-fire violations.

title: IDF strikes aid workers, says one was involved in Oct. 7 attack
After setbacks, Iran sees Lebanon cease-fire as chance to regroup
content: Iran has said that the halt in fighting is a victory for Hezbollah. But behind the scenes, officials worked quietly for a cease-fire to stem the group’s losses.
summary: Iran has said that the halt in fighting is a victory for Hezbollah. But behind the scenes, officials worked quietly for a cease-fire to stem the group’s losses.

title: 3 crushed to death at bakery amid growing hunger crisis in Gaza
Hezbollah chief claims victory in first remarks since cease-fire
A changed Georgia is no longer a haven for Russia’s political exiles
content: Russian political exiles once felt safe in Georgia, but the country has been cracking down on its own civil society and expelling anti-Kremlin dissidents.
summary: Russian political exiles once felt safe in Georgia, but the country has been cracking down on its own civil society and expelling anti-Kremlin dissidents.

title: What Putin’s nuclear-capable Oreshnik missile means for NATO security
content: The Russian leader’s use of the missile against Ukraine sends a powerful signal about his intention to weaken NATO and bend Europe’s security architecture to Russia’s will.
summary: The Russian leader’s use of the missile against Ukraine sends a powerful signal about his intention to weaken NATO and bend Europe’s security architecture to Russia’s will.

title: Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire appears to hold amid violation accusations
content: The Lebanese army said Israel violated the cease-fire agreement, while the IDF said it was responding to violations by Hezbollah.
summary: The Lebanese army said Israel violated the cease-fire agreement, while the IDF said it was responding to violations by Hezbollah.
